header_text: You are eating a cup of soup. Your arms move suddenly, and you accidentally spill some of the soup on your lap. As you wonder if anyone will notice the spill, you become anxious.

elements.text: You are eating a cup of soup. You experience a tremor, and you accidentally spill some of the soup on your lap. As you wonder if anyone will notice the spill, you become...

elements.name: You are eating a cup of soup. Your arms move suddenly, and you accidentally spill some of the soup on your lap. As you wonder if anyone will notice the spill, you become anxious._Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
